meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by my first-year History class and uncertain about my ability to succeed
meeting_request.description: Hi, my name is Angela and I'm a first-year student in the History program. I’ve taken a few classes so far, including a first-year seminar and a history of science course. I’ve enjoyed the material in both, but I’m feeling a lot more anxious lately than I was before class. Some of the topics are really complex and I’m still learning a lot, and I’m starting to feel like I’m not doing well in the class. I also feel like I don’t quite fit in with the other students in the class, which is making me even more anxious. I’m worried that I’m not good enough to be in this major, and I’m having a hard time processing whether or not I should even be in the course.
